name: FAIRY TALE
author: STEPHEN KING
desc: As you may know, Stephen King is one of the worlds bestselling writers ever and there is a very good reason for that: he writes books that draw you in and are impossible to put down.

name: SOLITO
author: JAVIER ZAMORA
desc: Solito: A Memoir is a memoir written by Javier Zamora. It was published in September 6, 2022 by Hogarth.

name: THE FURROWS
author: NAMWALI SERPELL
desc: The Furrows follows the story of Cassandra Williams, also known as Cee, whose mother is a white painter, and her father is a Black academic.

name: CHIP WAR
author: CHRIS MILLER

name: BUTLER WORLD
